# The `ScopedFatalErrorHandler` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/scopedfatalerrorhandler">ScopedFatalErrorHandler</a> - This is a simple helper class which just calls install&#95;fatal&#95;error&#95;handler in its constructor and remove&#95;fatal&#95;error&#95;handler in its destructor. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/scopedfatalerrorhandler">ScopedFatalErrorHandler</a> - This is a simple helper class which just calls install&#95;fatal&#95;error&#95;handler in its constructor and remove&#95;fatal&#95;error&#95;handler in its destructor.
